data.title: Emagine Entertainment
data.text:
3D

RealD 3D is the new generation of entertainment, with crisp, bright, ultra realistic images so lifelike you feel like you’ve stepped inside the movie. RealD 3D adds depth that puts you in the thick of the action, whether you’re taking a voyage through an undiscovered land or dodging objects that seem to fly into the theatre. Don’t just watch a movie, experience a new dimension of entertainment with RealD 3D.

Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine

The Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine brings a full Vegas-style experience while hosting exciting fan engagement events and offer unique promotions to movie and sports fans in the new premium venue. Now showing the biggest games of the day in professional and college sports. Admission is free and available on a first-come, first-served basis for individuals 21 years and older.

Dine N' View

Order dinner right from your theatre seat and have it delivered to you so you’ll never miss a moment of the movie in our premier dine-in theatre.

Dolby Atmos

Dolby Atmos represents the present and future of cinema audio with the ability to pinpoint “objects” of sound anywhere in the room. You will feel immersed in the film’s environment as if you are standing in the middle of the action.

Huge Screens

No squinting at this screen. Each theatre has huge screens so you are immersed in each movie.

Luxury Seating

We are taking comfort to the next level at Emagine. Each auditorium houses leather, power-reclining seats to allow our guests to truly kick back and relax. Paired with our stadium style seating everyone has the best seat in the house.

Reserved Seating

We offer reserved seating at our theatres so that you always get the seat you want. Purchase tickets at the box office, online or on our mobile app on Google Play or iOS App Store and choose the seat you want ahead of time!

The Emagine team is here to help plan a memorable party for your child and their friends.

It's Showtime Emperor! The Caesars Sportsbook Lounge Powered by Emagine is now showing the biggest games of the day in professional and college sports in a full Vegas-style experience.

Throw a strike with your besties on one of our 4 deluxe bowling lanes or in your own private room.

If you need your corporate presentation to make a huge impact, use our big screen to make it memorable.

Emagine reminds us all that education, our most important commodity for today's youth, can be fun with field trips to your local theatre.
